tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I was suffering from hip pain since 15th December, 2019, dont know the reasons, but unable to even walk for 10 min, if I walk or stand for longer pain was triggering from hip to foot, I have been to physiotherapist and she suggested few stretching, but pain was still there, after suffering till 16th March, i have taken appointment with Dr. Pranjal Sir. 

Dr. examine my issues and suggested few checkups i.e. blood checkups and X-rays, after that he prescribed few medicine for 5 days and advised relaxed the hip muscles. 

And 3 months suffering just reduced/almost disappeared in 5 days!

BIG THANKS YOU TO DR. PRANJAL SIR! 

He diagnosed right issue and treated the same.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: With the help of MRI report I got to know that I have ACL Tear and that was the reason I was suffering from weak knee. After treatment sessions with Dr. Pranjal Kodkani he suggested me to take physiotherapy and regular exercise for strength and now I have completely recovered and there is no pain or weakness at all.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Tripped on the road and the noise came like I broke my knee. I was very scared. I visited Dr. PranjalKodkani as soon as possible and there I came to know it was ACL tear and my knee can still be fine without going for surgery. I started my treatment by Dr. Pranjal and he was very helpful and supportive throughout the treatment. Got totally fine without surgery !

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My uncle had met with an accident and we came to know that he need a Knee replacement we all were worried because even after knee replacement his leg will never operate like before. And therefore we decided to take a second opinion and we are glad we did so, Dr Pranjal suggested us joint preserving surgery and now he is completely fine after the treatment without going for replacement. No one told us this treatment. Strongly recommend his opinion before surgery .
reply_text: Thanks for your detailed feedback. You are always welcome

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: **** ********* ****** ** Extremely disappointed that MRI  ams drays were suggested rather than proper clinical diagnosis establishment . Detailed review has been put on google .

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had knee injury 2 years back. No one could diagnose it. No one even suggested MRI. Dr Pranjal examined and on the MRI diagnosed it as ACL tear. I immediately opted for his Arthroscopy ACL Reconstruction. No pain after surgery. I could walk normal by 1 month. I am looking towards getting back to playing. Totally satisfied. **** ***

tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review: Doctor explained all the issues related the problem very well. He was friendly. ******** *** *** ***** ********* *** encouraging about BEAR technology for ACL repair which is advertised on his web site. Purpose of  my visit was not fulfilled. Would not recommend this doctor if someone is looking for experienced hand on BEAR.
reply_text:
Dear Harmeet. 
The BEAR procedure is reserved for certain indicated cases only. In your case it was not a clear indication for BEAR. 
We do understand that you came with the idea of getting Only the BEAR procedure, however from our experience with this procedure we believe in doing it selectively only where indicated and will ascertain good results with low failure rate. Your case was better suited for a reconstruction. 
We continue to believe in giving honest opinions and not opinions for patient appeasement or acquiring surgery. 
Thank you for the feedback. 
Best wishes for your surgery. 
Regards

tags: None
review:
Dr. Pranjal Kodkani specializes in the field of arthroscopic surgeries predominantly for management of sports injuries.
He performed a surgery for my ACL tear with minimum incisions.
Excellent doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: Dr. Pranjal Kodkani  is a nice doctor I have seen. I am very happy with his treatment and explaination about health issue.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: First visit seems good ,Checked my old reports and advised for some further test  so he could further have more clarity before going for treatment.
